comments.body:
Won't this be ~0 most of the time?
When it's just rotated, the cert will be vaild from around the same time.

Are you talking about ClientCertRotationAge?

If so, yeah it will be an empty stream until a cert is rotated. So a friend kubelet wont populate this metric with anything until its first certificate rotation. For shielded nodes this will be <10 days. Hypthetically for a kubelet that has been around for a long the histogram will observe the data:
[~10days, ~10days, ~10days, ...]

Does that answer your question?
